about-description: I specialize in advanced foot care, focusing on the prevention and treatment of various foot conditions. The treatments are tailored for individuals with specific medical needs, such as diabetes, nail disorders, and skin issues. We ensure a safe, hygienic, and comfortable experience.
footer-description: Specialized foot care focused on medical pedicure, hygiene, and long-term foot health.
services-description: Offering a range of medical pedicure services tailored to support your foot health. Whether you're managing diabetes, dealing with skin conditions, or simply seeking expert care.
reset-password-email-sent: Reset password email sent. Check your inbox.
error-enter-email-for-reset: Please enter an email to reset password
verify-email-description: Enter the code sent to your email.
register-description: Enter your information to create an account.
user-verified: User was registered and verified successfully!
fetch-user-error: Failed to fetch user after verification.
admin-bookings-description: Check and manage user's bookings here.
admin-services-description: Update, add, delete your services here.
admin-gallery-description: Update, add, delete your images here.
pricelist-description: Check all service prices in one place
aftercare-description: Tips for proper foot care after your appointment
gallery-description: Browse through our gallery showcasing real examples of completed medical pedicure treatments and results
